text: Doranda College, established in 1962, is a premier degree college in Ranchi, Jharkhand, India. It offers undergraduate courses in commerce, arts, sciences. Faculty of Management Studies offers postgraduate courses in MBA, M.Com. and Master of Rural Management. It is affiliated to Ranchi University. ==Accreditation== Doranda College is accredited with B+ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). ==See also== *Education in India *Ranchi University *Ranchi *Literacy in India *List of institutions of higher education in Jharkhand ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Colleges affiliated to Ranchi University Category:Educational institutions established in 1962 Category:Universities and colleges in Ranchi Category:Universities and colleges in Jharkhand
title: Doranda College
